title: Energy and temperature
abstract:
An English (2024) translation (v1) by P. Marquet of the Max Planck's 1911
paper "Energy and temperature" published first in French ("Energie et
temp\'erature", J. Phys. Theor. Appl., 1 (1), p.345-359) and then in German
("Energie und Temperatur", Phys. Z., 12 (16), p.681-687).
